about_the_game:
Gameplay features:

  • [Gaming Features]
  • [real world map]

Manage more than 20 areas, and your choice will determine whether mankind can usher in the next sunrise.
  • [4 science and technology lines]
Make careful use of funds and choose a reasonable route for upgrading science and technology.
  • [More than 50 kinds of disasters]
If you are not careful, mankind will be doomed.
  • [More than 10 dimensions]
The dimensions of population, food and social stability examine your leadership ability and analyze various data. If any index is out of control, it means that human beings no longer have a future.
  • [painful choice]
You must always make choices. Many people have to make sacrifices for the future of mankind.


At the beginning of the game, the population will increase continuously, and at the same time, various kinds of disasters will interrupt the population growth process. You need to click to solve the disaster.

There will be more than 50 kinds of disasters in the game to interrupt the normal development of the earth. You need to upgrade the science and technology tree by clicking on it to manage the disaster.

Efforts should be made to reduce the impact of disasters and maintain the stable development of population, food and social security in a difficult balance.

Click to upgrade the science and technology tree to reduce the damage caused by disasters, so as to increase the population and stabilize the society.

At the same time, through your strategy, keep steady population growth to gain capital growth and lead mankind to rebuild civilization.
Game introduction:
Destroy the world or save mankind?
How long can human beings exist is a strategy game. You play a doomsday commander. When the doomsday comes, you command human beings and survive hard.
This is a game from the future!
How long can human beings exist on the earth?
How long do you think human beings can exist on the earth?
Challenge more than 50 kinds of disasters that are destroying mankind!
With global warming, disasters in various regions become more frequent. Have you ever thought that one day nature will bring the ultimate punishment to the world, and human civilization will come to an end? How should you face it at that time?
One day in the future, a strong electromagnetic storm from the universe will sweep across the world, and human civilization will stop staying here. The earth's magnetic poles have also deflected, resulting in various natural disasters with unprecedented frequency and intensity! Because of your outstanding leadership ability, you have been entrusted with the important task of leading all mankind against disasters and striving to survive longer before the end of the day.

Message:

This time, we want to play a "big" game, command thousands of troops at will, map should go up to outer space and down to the bottom of the ocean, and military internal affairs and ethics should be the same. According to this setting, the game will not come out until the next Year of the Dog.
After some painful slashing, we cut off the functions that are difficult to realize, and only kept the core play-choice. In the game world view, human civilization has come to the brink of destruction, and various disasters may devour survivors at any time. As a leader, you must learn to balance various indicators and use limited resources in the most critical places. Sometimes, we even have to torture ourselves, whether to give up a part of the region and population.
This is still a big game. You manage the earth before the end of the day, and billions of people are waiting for your protection. Besides natural disasters, all kinds of man-made disasters appear from time to time and disrupt your plans.
Finally, I sincerely hope that the scenes in the game will not appear in reality, and that everyone will have fun when the game is officially launched!
